title: Dark Star Bundle
body:
Hey guys,

Does anyone know if the Dark Star bundle will be re-added to the store once the Thresh issues are worked out? Or do we miss out on the bundle pricing because the skin had a bug?

replies.body: The Dark Star Thresh sales will be extended once it's made available again!

> [{quoted}](name=ROFLSam,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=EkVIIx5A,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-06-21T13:54:31.548+0000)
>
> Fantastic! Thanks for the info.

I just wanted to follow up that the prices on the Dark Star website reflect the sale extensions:

> All champs 25% off. Oblivion Icon and Dark Star Ward 1 RP each with set.
Available 16/06 - 27/06 16:59 AEST

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/dark-star-thresh#darkStar
